\begin{itemize}
\item[(a)] if $u\in T_pM$, $Y\in\Gamma(\phi^*TN)$ and
$g\in C^\infty(M)$, then $\nabla^\phi_ufY=u[f]Y+f\nabla^\phi_u Y$;
\item[(b)]
 if $Y\in\Gamma(\phi^*TN)$ may locally be identified with a vector field
